section.title: Free cash transfer
section.content: It's free to open a UpayChat account, send or request money from anyone using UpayChat account balance.

section.title: Manage your privacy settings
section.content: UpayChat enables you to choose who can see your payment you can set payment preference to "friends", "public", or "private".

section.title: Express yourself with a payment note
section.content: Upaychat included a note section in the payment page which provides details about the transaction to avoid confusion.

section.title: Bill payment
section.content: Paying your bills is always fast and easy with Upaychat.

section.title: Manage your Upaychat Balance
section.content: Add money to your UpayChat account balance with your debit card, credit card, or your existing bank account.

section.title: Receiving/Withdrawing money
section.content: You can receive money into your Upaychat or transfer your balance to your existing bank account.

section.title: No monthly fee
section.content: Upaychat has no monthly fee, no maintenance fee, and no hidden fees or charges.

section.title: Live chat with Customer Care
section.content: Click on setting & help in our mobile app to chat directly with our Customer Care at any time.

section.title: Security and Safety
section.content: With UpayChat, your payment information is always encrypted before sending to our servers. Our goal is to protect your online safety, the confidentiality of our customer account, and personal data.
